page.title: 03TONYREFAIL'S BY-PASS
page.content: An engineer and surveyor who works on the new road came to the school to tell us some thing about the new road. In the winter,he explained,there are about 100 men working on the new By-pass and in the summer there are about 300 men.He said the men work as quietly as possible and try not to make too much mess. If the earth is dry they must spray water on it to stop the dust rising. He also told us he is hoping some cars will be using the new road underneath the new Francis Street bridge by July 1985.About christmas time he is hoping to finish the new road so it will be in full use in January 1986. This road is the most importent thing happening in and around Tonyrefail today.
